text: Baljit ("Baljeet") Singh Saini (born 12 August 1976 in Ropar, Punjab) is a field hockey defender and midfielder from India who made his international debut for the Men's National Team in 1995 during the Indira Gandhi Gold Cup. == References == * Bharatiya Hockey Category:1976 births Category:Indian field hockey players
title: Baljit Singh Saini
